topics.body:
"An independent study proving that Bt rice modified to control butterflies and moths in Asia has no adverse effects on their predators.":http://www.plosone.org/article/info:doi%2F10.1371%2Fjournal.pone.0035164

"This work was supported by the National Program on Key Basic Research Projects (973 Program, 2007CB109202), the Ministry of Science and Technology of China, the National Natural Science Foundation of China (30671377), and the Special Research Projects for Developing Transgenic Plants (2011ZX08011-001; 2008ZX08011-01). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript."

As you see, Monsanto had no part in funding the research.

topics.body:
Well here's something cool.  Solar roadways.  A literal mom and pop shop are currently working on a way to replace concrete roadways with solar panels thus fixing the problem of not having enough land for local solar plants.

It's gotten the attention of NASA, IEEE and GE.

If that's the case then department of transportation is going to eventually jump all over that to replace our current roads cause that would be far cheaper in the long run due to the roads paying for themselves; also it would produce three times the total amount of energy the usa needs.  So think about that; a net profit of about four hundred billion a year.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ep4L18zOEYI
